constituent: compare, spoon, sitting on the ground, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
heisigStory: With two spoons, one in each hand, you are comparing your mother's cooking with your mother-in-law's.
koohiiStory1: A gay couple about to turn around to compare which role is better...
koohiiStory2: Compare the two spoons... the one on the left is funny-looking.
myStory: so sánh. thìa ở phía trên luôn được đem so sánh
words:

比率(ひりつ): ratio, proportion, percentage
比例(ひれい): proportion
比較(ひかく): comparison
